title: Statement by NSC Spokesman Tommy Vietor on Train Accident in Poland | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
March 04, 2012

 



Statement by NSC Spokesman Tommy Vietor on Train Accident in Poland




The President sends his deepest condolences to the Polish people and to the families whose loved ones were killed or injured in yesterday's train accident in Poland.Â  As a close ally of Poland, the United States stands with the Polish people and is prepared to provide whatever assistance may be helpful.
